knimeNode.name: Mass Calculator
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node calculates the molecular mass or molar mass of a sum formula.

fullDescription.intro: The node calculates the molecular mass or molar mass of a sum formula. The node only works for major isotopes.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the sum formulas.
The mass to be calculated. Either molecular or molar mass.

ports.outPort: Table containing sum formulas and their masses.
